ygData.subject: Re: Druid
ygData.msgSnippet:
Find a party of 2-3 other players the same level and try the easier parts
of Black Burrow.  Or, hunt lions (young, lionesses, etc.) in the Karanas
plains.  If
ygData.messageBody:
Find a party of 2-3 other players the same level and try the easier parts
of Black Burrow. Or, hunt lions (young, lionesses, etc.) in the Karanas
plains. If you have a slightly bigger party, try giant spiders and grizzly
bears.

Karim / Alladine
